context.title: Trace Integration
context.description: Trace Integration transforms existing reflection seismic data into relative impedance.

context.title: Volume Calculator Algorithm
context.description: Volume Calc applies the linear transform: Vout = (B1*Vin) + B2 over an area of interest. B1 and B2 are either constant values or horizons.

context.title: MVXP Algorithm
context.description: MVXP does median-based windowed scaling on seismic volumes.
